title: Kane Williamson

coverImage.license: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.0 Generic license.

summary: Kane Williamson is an international cricket player from New Zealand and also the current captain of the team.

value.label: Kane Stuart Williamson
Invalid Date (age 28)
Tauranga, New Zealand
New Zealander
Batsman
Williamson scored 40 centuries before he left school.

value.label: Williamson made his first-class cricket debut in December 2007
Williamson made his One-Day International debut against India, and was dismissed for a duck.

The India national cricket team is also known as Team India and Men in Blue. India is ranked first in Tests, second in ODIs and second in T20Is by the ICC. Virat Kohli is the current captain of the team, while the head coach is Ravi Shastri.
